resources.name: en
resources.title: English
resources.string_upd: The module is not compatible with your version of UNA
The new version of {0} module isn't compatible with your version of UNA. Please upgrade UNA first (Studio > Dashboard > Version) and then try to upgrade the module.
your version is incompatible with UNA, must be at least {0}
Path to directory where UNA files are stored.

UNA content and profiles are controlled by Admins and Moderators right on the site front-end, so you don’t have to worry about that in Studio. You do need to appoint your Admins and Moderators, though. And this is where you do it. If you also want to be the site Admin, just create your profile use “Set Membership” to upgrade it.
Dashboard gives a quick overview of the site status. UNA version, space usage, hosting tools and cache. Different Apps will add their blocks to Dashboard.

UNA comes with only a handful of core Apps. Choose, download and install Apps to add profiles types, modules, system tools, plugins, languages and design templates. You can activate and deactivate installed Apps. UNA is super-modular and incredibly flexible, letting you choose your own combination of functionality, settings and database structure to make the social site of your dreams real. Even without changing anything you will have the perfectly functioning social site!
